description: Main front-end source file for a Flutter-based Tic Tac Toe game, defining the main application widget, game screen, and UI components.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application that sets up theme and routing.

classes.name: GameScreen
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main game interface, handling game state, user interactions, and AI moves.

classes.name: _ModeSelector
classes.description: Widget for selecting game mode (player vs player or against AI).

classes.name: _StatusBanner
classes.description: Displays the current game status, turn indicator, or game result.

classes.name: _ResultCard
classes.description: Displays the game result with animated style.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for each widget class.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Configures and returns the Material theme for the app.

methods.name: _handleCellTap
methods.description: Handles user tapping on a board cell, making a move, and triggering AI move if applicable.
